name: Zombie Castle
description:
: 

This project was created as part of the Experimental Games Lab project at the Bauhaus University Weimar in the Winter Semester of 2021. The aim of the project was to understand the game development process and apply it in the real world.

Credits:  

Sound & Narration - Abhay Syal  |  Game Art Design - Jin Wang  |  Character design & UI - Junting Liu   |   Game Programming & Logic - Ketan Patel 

Sound Credits: opengameart.org (Fato Shadow , spookymodem , chibibagu), freesound.org

Installation Instructions:

Unpack the .zip file and run ZombieCastle.exe
